#summary A quick introduction to creating 2D pictures of molecules.
#labels Tutorial

*Note* The following method only works in releases of the RDKit from May 2008 onwards.

The simplest possible way:
{{{
from rdkit import Chem
from rdkit.Chem import Draw
mol = Chem.MolFromSmiles('c1ccncc1CC(=O)O')
Draw.MolToImageFile(mol,'test.png')
}}}
